title: About
text:
My Ph.D is supervised by associate professor Yanfei Kang.
I was well trained in the KLLAB run by Yanfei Kang and associate professor Feng Li from Central University of Finance and Economics.
I’m currently visisting associate professor Anastasios Panagiotelis from University of Sydney.
